mapper.insert: insert into tb_group (group_id,chain_id,genesis_block_hash,group_name,node_count,create_time,modify_time) values(#{groupId},#{chainId},#{genesisBlockHash},#{groupName},#{nodeCount},NOW(),NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE node_count=#{nodeCount},modify_time=NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id groupId,a.chain_id chainId,a.node_count nodeCount,b.contractCount FROM tb_group a LEFT JOIN ( select group_id,count(1) contractCount from tb_contract where contract_type= 0 and contract_status=2 and chain_id = #{chainId} GROUP BY group_id )b on(a.group_id = b.group_id) where a.group_id = #{groupId} and a.chain_id = #{chainId}
